title: Social Education Competency Enhancement Program Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of secondary social studies curriculum and practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment implementation for in-service secondary social studies teachers combining MOOCs with in-person instruction. Supports flexible learning through personal device (BYOD) utilization

learning_goals: Learners can integrate MOOC content and face-to-face activities by at least 70% to design blended learning lessons.
Learners can develop and implement strategies to enhance learner engagement by 25% or more by linking LMS and in-person classes.
Learners can analyze blended learning model case studies and design two or more assessment tools to improve academic achievement.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
